Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery transport amphora. Coarse yellowish brown (10 YR 6/4) clay with much silver mica and white inclusions, fired in the centre grey (10 YR 6/1). White slip with red-fired band.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p. 23, no. A13, pl. 4, 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.003)
